channel.title: About SAML authentication with HENNGE One
channel.description:
Hi! I have a question about the subject.
Is Redash's SAML authentication as follows?
- Compatible with SAML2.0 - NameID (user account information) of SAML authentication matches any item of user information on HENNGE Access Control - Support both or either SP-Initiated SSO / IdP-Initiated SSO - Can handle "urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:emailAddress" as NameIDFormat
Best Regards

item.title: About SAML authentication with HENNGE One
item.dc:creator: naoya-nakamura-okan
item.description:
Hi!
I have a question about the subject.

Is Redash’s SAML authentication as follows?

  • Compatible with SAML2.0
  • NameID (user account information) of SAML authentication matches any item of user information on HENNGE Access Control
  • Support both or either SP-Initiated SSO / IdP-Initiated SSO
  • Can handle “urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:emailAddress” as NameIDFormat

Best Regards

Read full topic
item.source: About SAML authentication with HENNGE One
